title: Firecrest 82mm Superslim stackable multicoated UV 400 Filter
features: 39mm Firecrest UV 400mm multicoated filter in stackable 5.5mm ring
Highest quality Firecrest UV filter with 400nM cut off
Built in the UK using Schott Superwite glass for highest image fidelity
Firecrest multicoating is anti reflective, anti scratch and hydrophobic for shooting in most challenging conditions
Maximum UV protection for outdoors, snow and high altitude whilst also an excellent everyday filter
